title: Purpose
context: [PART XXX.] TATTOO ARTISTS Revision Note In this part, &ldquo;part&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;chapter&rdquo;. Cross References Sunset evaluations modified, see §§26H-4, 5. Law Journals and Reviews The Constitution and Inking: How Anderson v. City of Hermosa Beach Expanded First Amendment Protection for the Tattoo Industry. 33 UH L. Rev. 417 (2010). [§321-371] Purpose. The purpose of this part is the protection of public health and safety through the licensing and regulation of tattoo artists. [L 1990, c 285, pt of §2]
